```{r}
side_bar <- function(df){
  sb <- paste(
    cat("#  {.sidebar}\n"),
    "```{r, results = 'asis', echo = FALSE}\n",
    2 + 2,
    "\n```", sep = "")
  cat(sb)
}
```

```{r, results = 'asis', echo = FALSE}
side_bar(df)
```
